meanings.definition: Hair grown on the sides of the face in front of the ears.
meanings.sent1: His sideburns were long and bushy.
meanings.sent2: She trimmed her sideburns to match her hairstyle.
meanings.sent3: The sideburns on his face made him look like a wise old owl.
meanings.sent4: Her sideburns were like two dark curtains framing her face.
meanings.sent5: The barber shaped his sideburns into perfect little triangles.
